website_summaries.verdict: At a competitive price, this set of 6 ties is an impressive deal that leaves men looking stylish and feeling great.
pros: Set includes high quality tie clips
Ties come in a variety of colors that easily pair with a wide range of colored and patterned dress shirts seamlessly
These come at an affordable price without sacrificing quality or style
cons: Some find ties to be short and thin

customer_reviews.title: Nice ties!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a congratulations on a new job for my man, he loved! These were much nicer than expected, beautiful colors, not too flashy, soft, silky fabric, wonderful for price!
customer_reviews.author: RRTNPS

customer_reviews.title: Not "too good to be true"
customer_reviews.text: When I saw that this was a pack of 6 ties and 3 clips were only $20, I thought it was too good to be true. Or maybe the ties were all kid sizes. I was pleasantly surprised that they were the appropriate adult length and that there was nothing wrong with them! I see ties for $20 alone at stores, so I would totally recommend this pack for anyone who needs more tie variety as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Get What You Pay For and it's fine
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because so far no rips in the fabric. I use these ties for my restaurant job as a fine dining steakhouse server. The 3 tie clips really come in handy and it allows me to be creative with what tie/clip combo I want to wear that night at work. I'm knocking off a star because The clip tends to get stuck sometimes with the tie fabric. It's only slightly annoying, but if you're not careful, you could probably easily rip your tie. Either way, if you're looking for bargain price ties that APPEAR to be classy, these will do the job in tricking people into thinking you have class xD
customer_reviews.author: JustChillDude445

customer_reviews.title: These make good gifts.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice enough generic ties. I usually get them as gifts since they are a nice variety for a good price and I can buy for more people than if I were to buy them all individually. The range of colors and and patterns are good. The tie pins are kind of cheap but the ties are decent quality, if not high-end name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Galaverna

customer_reviews.title: Great tie for the cost...
customer_reviews.text: These ties are great if you are looking for something affordable. The tie clips would be better if they had some type of design on them and this is one reason I gave this product a 4 Star. Another reason I gave it a 4 Star is the ties are not long like some of the other reviews mentioned. I for one don't mind the shortness of the ties because I always wear a jacket or sweater however I could see why some customers complain about the length.
customer_reviews.author: MARVIN FOSTER

customer_reviews.title: A bit short
customer_reviews.text: The tie fabric and patterns are great, and more than I would expect for the low price. The tie clips are a nice bonus as well since they always tend to get lost. Only downside is that the ties are a bit short, so it's not possible to tie something like a double windsor. Length is perfect for smaller knots.
customer_reviews.author: HristovV

customer_reviews.title: Classically distinguished
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my spouse since he got a promotion and his dress requires a tie. He is very pleased with the colors and 3 free ties clips that came with ties. Since the ties were not expensive he was impressed with the quality. We like the storage bag that come with them. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft fabric, good quality for the price. I'm about 6 ft. tall, and they're long enough for me to at least tie a half windsor that reaches the belt. The tie clips are really snazzy too
customer_reviews.author: credible editor

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who was doing interviews. I was really pleased with the quality of these. I was worried that for the price they would seem cheap when they came but they are anything but. I would easily order these again and the you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: CMauser

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Received my package today. I must say..... I'm impressed. Great quality ties and tie pins. Can't wait to wear them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kareem Kasmally

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy on a budget:) 6 ties for the price of one on certain brands. Also included 3 clips.i got these as a gift for my father for his work. He will be happy.

customer_reviews.title: Ties! For my neck!
customer_reviews.text: I don't EVERY wear ties...in fact I don't know how to tie a tie. I have a fat neck so I have always hated wearing them Ties were of nice quality and colors. Clips were a nice touch too. Nothing SUPER high quality but still looks nice. Time to learn how to tie a tie!
customer_reviews.author: Josay

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. No gift box.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and great value. But unlike what some other reviewers state, my ties did not come with a gift box. Just a plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Tie this deal on!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son to use when the hockey team dresses up on a school day. The price was right for ties that might end up in a hockey bag. The quality was way better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking ties that are very affordable! If I need more ties, I'd buy from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie :)

customer_reviews.title: Good for your money
customer_reviews.text: Great ties. Nice material and not cheap looking. Plus the tie clips work wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda S.

customer_reviews.title: For the cost selection couldn't,t be surpassed.
customer_reviews.text: The variety and choices provided were impeciable too complete my Van Heusen dress shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Georgr Barfield

customer_reviews.title: Not a bargain
customer_reviews.text: These have nice colors and material, but they are too thin and short.
customer_reviews.author: R&D

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and look
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and length. Great add to my selection of business ties.
customer_reviews.author: ArtWithStyle

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Worth Every Penny. Will Buy More.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the money! Will definitely buy more sets of them. I work in a professional federal job and these look great. Tie bars are pretty nice as well. Extremely strong tie bars. Tie will NOT move around.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value. If you're like me and wear a tie about 3 or 4 times a year then these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great looking ties
customer_reviews.text: I work at a funeral home and need to look my best. These ties are amazing. Very sharp, well made, and easy on the eyes. I will definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Radkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on these ties regularly. I wear a tie to work 6 days a week. Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: These look great on my husband and what a great buy! We like the variety of colors and patterns that each set comes with. The tie clips are a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Webb

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality at a great price / would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Tie's & tie clips.
customer_reviews.text: I realy liked the tie's & clips. Good quality. Thay were a gift.
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Very clean,and classic style. Feels expensive at a reasonable price. Nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Heeney

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: They were very modern ( slim fit) and the fabric was great. Best bang for money .
customer_reviews.author: Kervie Francis

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat This Awesome Set!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for - great ties at an unbeatable value!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Good Ties, No Tie Bars
customer_reviews.text: The Ties are of good quality. I did not receive any Tie Bars with the Shipment. I would like for the shipper to send them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Remm

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Meh!! The ties are ok, nothing special. You definitely get what you pay for. Material is mediocre, width is medium.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. The colors are so nice. Plus, the price was great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Holley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for work or church if you wear suits.
customer_reviews.text: These ties and clips are nice. I wear with suits for my job and think they are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present for my boys. I loved the selection and how nice they were.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary F

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tie set
customer_reviews.text: Quick processing and delivery of order, I have not worn the ties yet but they seam of good quality and just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Hunt

customer_reviews.title: For my brother
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my brother for Christmas. He loved it. Great price for 6 tires.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Price

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking ties
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these ties as a Christmas gift for my son. We'll have to wait to see what he thinks but I think they look very nice. All the reviews I read did they were happy with them. I think we will be, too.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband on Christmas and he loved it! Good quality and nice color variety.
customer_reviews.author: EsteMonSchuBe

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love these ties. My son loves the color. I love the price.
customer_reviews.author: CYCOLOGISTTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Okay Quality - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Ties are okay and certainly better than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: They're good quality ties and the clips are a nice accessory included.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice ties!
customer_reviews.text: Work in an office and all the ties are nice.
customer_reviews.author: 1miadora

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel really nice, the designs are really great.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Bedoya

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors of the ties and they fit great. great buy
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Good DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time and I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Seven

customer_reviews.title: Great ties
customer_reviews.text: The ties are great and look well when done in a trinity knot!
customer_reviews.author: Graham Basha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described. Order came fast. Colors were true to what was shown.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Gale

customer_reviews.title: Long enough to full Windsor knot without leaving short end too short.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking ties. They are also longer with I needed being 6’2. Will buy more of this brand of different colors.
customer_reviews.author: sean g

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great ties. Tie clips are a added plus.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the ties. I will order more. They have a great selection. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great Ties
customer_reviews.text: Great ties and the clips are a great addition. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GsNp

customer_reviews.title: Nice tie, not so nice tie bar
customer_reviews.text: Ties were nice but the tie bars were bent and didn’t work. All in all for the price not bad.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: All the ties looked great and did not feel cheap very impressed thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JOHNNY PICKING

customer_reviews.title: The young men loved the ties, and we did a demonstration on how to properly tie one.
customer_reviews.text: The ties are lovely, and were given to young men who are mentored by my organization.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Squire

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that these ties would be a cheap quality but, I was pleasantly surprised at how nice they were for the price.
customer_reviews.author: melody

customer_reviews.title: Great Ties!
customer_reviews.text: All 6 ties were of very high quality and look great on the tie rack.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ties for a low price! My boyfriend love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice ties
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ties were pretty short but I’m 6’1 and think they fit nicely after tied properly. Will probably be buying more in future
customer_reviews.author: Tmbrown16

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are a gift. What I saw I liked. Hope my Son likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and quiality.better for the money is hard to find .
customer_reviews.author: unilanda

customer_reviews.title: nice ties
customer_reviews.text: nicer than expected for the price. 6 ties and 3 clips.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are premium ties! I love the variety of colors that are offered!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon S.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is just ok, not the top quality product as seen on the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin King

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband and am so pleased by the quality and material! This set comes with 3 basic yet gorgeous tie clips in colors gold, silver, and black. That was just a bonus! All 6 colors and patterns on the ties are vibrant and sophisticated. Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: moondress

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: 6 ties for the price of 1, and just as good as any other ties I had before
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

product_meta.title: Jeatonge Lot 6 Pcs Mens Ties and 3 Free Tie Clips, Men's Classic Tie Necktie Woven Jacquard Neck Ties Gift box packing (Style 2)
product_meta.description: Men's 6 Classic Tie Necktie Woven Jacquard Neck Ties with 3 Free Tie Clips Gift box packing
feature_bullets: If you want different style ties set, please come in to my store.
Size: length is 59.8" (152 cm), width is 3.1" (8 cm) at widest
The neckties are waterproof and high quality, the stitching and thread are gorgeous
Suitable Occasion: Any formal occasion /events, such as prom, wedding, parties, church, business ,meeting
Material: Polyester and silk. Waterproof and high quality
